answers.answer: I'm right there with you. I'm 32 weeks and my baby has been head down since I was about 28 weeks. My son has been measuring big my whole pregnancy and my dr told me I could expect him early. Which is probably true. He also dropped three days ago. Just try not to stress over it. Them being in position isn't necessarily a sign of impending arrival.

I'm 30 weeks and at 27+5 weeks the baby was measuring 30 weeks and weighing 2 pounds 10 ounces.back at clinic tomo.they taught it might be gestational diabetes but I passed the glucose test.could be big baby x
Yea im trying not to freak out. I've been losing bits of my plug for a couple weeks and having contractions off and on.

question: Plus im measuring at 30.2. Im kind of freaking out i don't want him to come too early im not due until end of February and my dr said there's no way im going to go that long
title: 28 weeks and baby has already turned and dropped
